name: Stupor youtube Fighter
description:
Stupor Youtube Fighter is a two-player third-person fighting game with Youtube personalities as its cast of characters. Unleash deadly signature abilities at the right moment to get an edge over your opponent and shut down their channel, or at least kill them.

Play with a friend! Play as your favorite youtuber! Punch your friend's favorite youtuber as your favorite youtuber! Then punch your friend!

Not really.

Don't do that.

- - - - - - -

Two PC-compatible controllers are highly recommended to play.

Controls:

Start to pause
(Esc on keyboard)

Move with the left stick
(W/A/S/D on keyboard)
Look around with the right stick
(Mouse drag)
Toggle running with the left stick button
(Left shift on keyboard)

Quick attack with the left trigger
(Left mouse button)
Strong attack with the right trigger
(Right mouse button)
Block quick attacks with both triggers at the same time
(Both mouse buttons)

Jump with the bottom face button (X for Playstation/A for Xbox)
(Spacebar on keyboard)
Use the Utility ability with the left face button (Square for Playstation/X for Xbox)
(Left Alt on keyboard)
Use the Combat ability with the right face button (Circle for Playstation/B for Xbox)
(E on keyboard)
Use the Ultimate ability with the top face button (Triangle for Playstation/Y for Xbox)
(Q on keyboard)
